| HistoryText             = The Spaceknights were the [[50-State Initiative (Earth-616)|Initiative]] team for [[Illinois (State)|Illinois]], based in [[Chicago (Illinois)|Chicago]].{{r|Civil War #6}}

During the [[Secret Invasion|Skrull Invasion]], they were in position in their town, fighting a [[Skrull]] fleet, quickly visited by the speedster [[Spinner (Earth-616)|Spinner]].{{r|Avengers: The Initiative #19}}

| Equipment               = 
| Transportation          = 
| Weapons                 = 

| Notes                   = 
| Trivia                  = * Nothing is known about the team, but it is possible they are related to the [[Spaceknights (Galadorian) (Earth-616)|Galadorian Spaceknights]], as [[Spinner (Earth-616)|Spinner]] stated during the [[Secret Invasion|Skrull Invasion]], "''Man, '''Do''' they hate shape-changing aliens!''",{{r|Avengers: The Initiative #19}} a possible reference to the Galadorian Spaceknight's recurring conflict with the [[Dire Wraiths]].
* The Spaceknights have never appeared on screen. They were only mentioned in two occasion: During the ''[[Civil War]]'' in {{cl|Civil War #6}}, and during the ''[[Secret Invasion]]'' in {{cl|Avengers: The Initiative #19}}.
